com.blukii.sdk.config

Class Firmware

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blukii.sdk.config.Firmware

  • public class Firmware
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the firmware version information of a blukii.

    You can get the Firmware from a Blukii object via Blukii.FIRMWARE.

    See Also:
    Blukii, Blukii.FIRMWARE

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int BASE
      Base firmware version as integer value.
      int INT
      Firmware version as integer value.
      java.lang.String LONGNAME
      Internal Long Name string.
      java.lang.String NAME
      Name string like "002.015".
      BlukiiSubType SUBTYPE
      BlukiiSubType of the firmware.
      BlukiiType TYPE
      BlukiiType of the firmware.
      static Firmware V_UNKNOWN
      Fallback value if the blukii firmware is not known
      int VERSION
      Build firmware version as integer value.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • V_UNKNOWN

        public static final Firmware V_UNKNOWN
        Fallback value if the blukii firmware is not known

      • NAME

        public final java.lang.String NAME
        Name string like "002.015".

      • LONGNAME

        public final java.lang.String LONGNAME
        Internal Long Name string.

        It is only different to NAME if a admin user is logged in.

      • TYPE

        public final BlukiiType TYPE
        BlukiiType of the firmware.

      • SUBTYPE

        public final BlukiiSubType SUBTYPE
        BlukiiSubType of the firmware.

      • BASE

        Base firmware version as integer value.

      • VERSION

        Build firmware version as integer value.
